current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To modify the project for navigation, Mississippi River
		  Ship Channel, Gulf of Mexico to Baton Rouge, Louisiana, and for other
		  purposes.

Committee on Environment and Public

			 2013

text.#text:
to conduct a pilot
			 disposal and sediment project in the Southwest Pass area to determine the
			 cost-effectiveness of pump-out disposal operations for hopper dredges
			 for—

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Dredging for Restoration and Economic Development for Global Exports Act of 2013/s:2/ss:a/p:3

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
, shall consult with appropriate Federal, State, and local
			 agencies and stakeholders to determine the safe placement and timing of
			 pump-out disposal operations that protect, create, restore, and nourish coastal
			 wetlands and aquatic habitat.

shall
